Wopee.io â€” AI Testing Agents for Web Apps

Summary
Wopee.io provides autonomous AI testing agents that generate, execute, and maintain regression tests for web applications. The platform focuses on critical user journeys and high-risk areas by combining project context with large language model workflows.

Key capabilities
- Generate test suites from URLs, requirements, user stories, or existing test cases.
- Execute regression suites with parallel runs.
- Maintain and update tests with AI when the application changes.
- Integrate into CI/CD pipelines for automated execution and reporting.

Supported testing frameworks
- Playwright
- Cypress
- Robot Framework
- WebDriver-based frameworks
- Custom frameworks via open interfaces

Integrations
- CI/CD: GitHub Actions (primary), Jenkins, GitLab, Bitbucket, custom pipelines
- APIs: GraphQL API, Wopee MCP server
- LLM providers: Azure AI, OpenAI, Google Cloud, Anthropic (others by request)

Product links
- Website: https://website.wopee.io/
- Blog: https://website.wopee.io/blog
- Docs: https://docs.wopee.io/
- Contact: https://website.wopee.io/contact-us/

Company
